item.title: Widgets
item.description: This guide includes a list of all widget types available, their options, and the actions you can take. To take full advantage of widgets, you should strategize how to tag, group, and visualize the data in your environment. General knowledge on elements and the behavior of your metrics is strongly encouraged before making a custom dashboard. Move Widgets Hover over the widgetâ€™s title to select. The header turns gray and your cursor is replaced with when a widget is selected.
